Description: Upper body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed black (fired reddish-brown); exterior: part of elaborate rosette and hooked swastika as filling ornament; inscription on interior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 25)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 644, no. 27)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0174) (phase 2)
